name: Chaitanya Foundation
briefDescription: CHAITANYA FOUNDATION is aiming to address the health and livelihood problems of the community. It involves in issues related to gender discrimination. It works for women, children and adolescent boys and girls belonging to the deprived and marginalized section of the society. The geographic coverage of its activities is Central Bihar, India.There is an 07 memberâ€™s executive committee, which consists of President, General Secretary, and other members of the organization for making important decisions.
